title: Fabrication and performance evaluation of polyethersulfone membranes with varying compositions of polyvinylpyrrolidone and polyethylene glycol for textile wastewater treatment using MBR
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Md. Nur-E Alam, Shamim Ahmed Deowan, Shakil Shahriar Efty, Fariha Chowdhury, Ahsanul Haque Milon, Mohammad Nurnabi
